name: Hell Survive
description: The epidemic swept the whole world. Zombies are looking for food, which is all living things on the planet. Doctors are trying to fix the epidemic and save the world. You are a mercenary who must destroy as many zombies as possible, because only you can reduce the population of evil and hungry zombies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 280 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
